summary: The module implements a NeMo dataset class that generates synthetic images using the Imagen model and provides utilities for constructing training and validation datasets, applying image augmentations, handling image pyramids, and optionally using pickle-based transforms.
business_intent: To supply synthetic image data for training and evaluating multimodal models, such as diffusion or text-to-image systems, within the NVIDIA NeMo framework, enabling scalable and configurable data pipelines.
